properties.label: Method
properties.description: Method used to define chemical species emitted at the surface (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

enum.label: Emissions Methods
enum.description: Method used to define chemical species emitted (several methods allowed because the different species may not use the same method).

properties.label: Sources
properties.description: Sources of the chemical species emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

enum.description: Sources of the chemical species emitted at the surface that are taken into account in the emissions scheme

properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and specified via an interactive method

properties.description: List of chemical species emitted at the surface and specified via an "other method"

properties.description: Characteristics of the "other method" used for chemical emissions at the surface

subProcesses.label: Dry Deposition
subProcesses.description: Dry deposition describes the dry processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

properties.label: Interactive
properties.description: Is dry deposition interactive (as opposed to prescribed)?

subProcesses.label: Wet Deposition
subProcesses.description: Wet deposition describes the moist processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

properties.label: Included
properties.description: Is wet deposition included?

subProcesses.label: Oxidation
subProcesses.description: Oxidation describes the loss of electrons or an increase in oxidation state by a molecule.

properties.label: Included
properties.description: Is wet oxidation included?

subProcesses.label: Resolution
subProcesses.description: Resolution in the atmospheric chemistry grid

properties.label: Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

properties.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
properties.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

properties.label: Number Of Vertical Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels resolved on computational grid.

properties.label: Is Adaptive Grid
properties.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

subProcesses.label: Tuning Applied
subProcesses.description: Tuning methodology for atmospheric chemistry component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Global Mean Metrics Used
properties.description: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Regional Metrics Used
properties.description: List of regional metrics of mean state used in tuning model/component

properties.label: Trend Metrics Used
properties.description: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component
